entries.title: Nvidia's new AI tool for Chrome will make YouTube videos pop
entries.description: Nvidia revealed the release date for its RTX Video Super Resolution tool, which uses AI to enhance videos on Chrome and Edge.

entries.title: 5G IoT connections are set to hit a major milestone this year
entries.description: Report notes healthcare and smart cities are about to invest big in 5G IoT connections.

entries.title: Samsung 990 Pro SSDs are apparently failing fast, and nobody knows why
entries.description: Bad news for owners of this high-end Samsung drive, as users report alarmingly rapid deterioration.

entries.title: Russian firms are being bombarded with DDoS attacks
entries.description: Rostelcom complains some 600 companies suffered DDoS attacks in 2022, as the conflict with Ukraine escalated.

entries.title: Is it worth getting a robot vacuum?
entries.description: A robot vacuum can save a lot of time and effort when keeping the home clean, and the app has a lot to do with that.

entries.title: Google is shutting its website experience and optimization tool
entries.description: Google Optimize and Optimize 360 shutting down could affect web developers ability to perform A/B tests on sites.

entries.title: This Elden Ring mod just gave me something I wish was in the base game
entries.description: Elden Ring Reforged, a top PC mod for the acclaimed RPG, adds an awesome feature not present in the retail release.

entries.title: How to find your sleep window and catch better ZZZs
entries.description: Can't sleep? Knowing your optimal time to go to bed can make a world of difference; here's how to work it out.

entries.title: Ted Lasso star is a good-natured joke in Apple data privacy video
entries.description: Ted Lasso star's humorous Apple Data privacy video is centerpiece of latest Apple Data privacy initiative

entries.title: Google Ads hijacked to push spam, adult websites
entries.description: Hackers have found a clever way to bypass Google Ads phishing protection and deliver malicious emails.

entries.title: CDPR dev admits that Cyberpunk 2077 ‘could have been better’
entries.description: In a Twitch stream, Cyberpunk 2077’s Quest Director fielded player questions about the game and offered some interesting answers.

entries.title: Intel planning hundreds of job cuts
entries.description: Intel becomes the latest tech giant to have announced plans for layoffs and cutbacks in 2023.

entries.title: Dead Space’s Isaac joins Fortnite ahead of remake release
entries.description: Epic Games has announced that Isaac Clarke from the Dead Space games is now a  playable character in Fortnite.

entries.title: iOS 16.3 lets you use a physical security key to secure your iPhone
entries.description: Apple users can now use a physical security key to protect their entire online data, alongside end-to-end encryption.

entries.title: Forza Motorsport will take center stage during this Forza Monthly live stream
entries.description: More Forza Motorsport details are set to be shared in the next Forza Monthly live stream.

entries.title: Microsoft says AI will be as important as the invention of the PC and internet
entries.description: Microsoft pledges further funds to the company behind the popular chatbot ChatGPT.

entries.title: FBI confirms North Korean Lazarus Group was behind major Harmony crypto heist
entries.description: Lazarus was observed laundering millions of stolen ether, with some of the funds subsequently frozen.

entries.title: Nvidia won the battle of GPU searches on Google so conclusively it isn't even funny
entries.description: As an example, the RTX 4090 GPU was searched for seven times more than AMD’s competing RDNA 3 flagship.

entries.title: The original TikTok launched ten years ago today – and Twitter might bring it back
entries.description: The early predecessor to TikTok, Vine, launched ten years ago today – and Twitter could have plans to bring the video app back.

entries.title: Microsoft serves Sony a subpoena in preparation for impending FTC lawsuit
entries.description: To prepare itself for an impending legal battle, Microsoft has served Sony with a subpoena.

entries.title: Microsoft wants to help stop you being hit by Excel malware
entries.description: Crooks have been using XLL files in phishing attacks, successfully delivering malware and infostealers to Microsoft Excel users.

entries.title: Rumored Apple VR headset won't use controllers – it'll use your eyes and hands
entries.description: The Apple VR headset is looking set to be a controller-less device, instead relying on eye and hand tracking.

entries.title: Gen Z are apparently worse at file organization than boomers - don't get too angry now
entries.description: New research suggests Zoomers can't use folders on their computers - but how true is that really?

entries.title: WhatsApp on macOS finally gets a big update with a gold icon that's out now
entries.description: Meta has made a native version of WhatsApp available for macOS users bringing speed and a better interface to boot.

entries.title: 4K HDR support means the Mac mini M2 Pro might be ideal for your home theater
entries.description: It would be an expensive HTPC, but the new Mac mini is an interesting alternative to an Apple TV for some people.

entries.title: Apple fixes dangerous iOS flaw that could have let hackers take over your iPhone
entries.description: Newer iOS devices were patched late last year, but older ones remained vulnerable.

entries.title: AMD makes another blunder – what on earth is going on?
entries.description: Another error on AMD's site might just seem like a small niggle, but there have been lots of missteps made lately.

entries.title: A Samsung Galaxy S23 teaser video highlights epic night and moon shots
entries.description: An official Samsung Galaxy S23 teaser video has been released, and it's focused on the cameras.

entries.title: Stripe and Amazon want to fuel the future of ecommerce
entries.description: Partnership will see Amazon and Stripe work together to boost ecommerce across the globe.

entries.title: Ant-Man 3's MODOK was inspired by a classic Simpsons villain
entries.description: Ant-Man 3's head writer has revealed the surprising influence behind one of the Marvel movie's villains.

entries.title: How to make sure your home office stays secure all year round
entries.description: Keep your home office safe and sound with these tips.

entries.title: Meta's bringing end-to-end encryption to all Messenger users, but not all at once
entries.description: Besides the added protection, E2EE chats will gain new customization features like themes and emoji reactions.
